attributes.name: autocomplete
attributes.title: Autocomplete
attributes.description: Sets the autocomplete method to use when the combobox receives user input

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.title: Disabled
attributes.description: Sets the disabled state of the combobox

attributes.name: name
attributes.title: Name
attributes.description: This element's value will be surfaced during form submission under the provided name

attributes.name: position
attributes.title: Position
attributes.description: Controls the placement of the combobox dropdown

attributes.name: placeholder
attributes.title: Placeholder
attributes.description: Sets the placeholder value of the combobox to provide a hint to the user

attributes.name: value
attributes.title: Value
attributes.description: The initial value of the combobox

slots.title: Default slot
slots.description: Supports fluent-option, option elements, or elements with a role of option

slots.name: control
slots.title: Input Control slot
slots.description: Slot to replace the contents of the control container

slots.name: indicator
slots.title: Indicator slot
slots.description: Slot to provide a custom icon to represent the visual indicator

slots.name: start
slots.title: Start slot
slots.description: Contents of the start slot are positioned before the contents of the control container

slots.name: end
slots.title: End slot
slots.description: Contents of the end slot are positioned after the contents of the control container
